intro: Alstonia pangkorensis, commonly known as the Kauai alstonia, is a flowering plant native to the island of Kauai in Hawaii. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its ornate, showy flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 10 meters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have a smooth texture, while its bark is rough and fissured. Alstonia pangkorensis is adapted to the humid, tropical climate of its native habitat and is often found in coastal and lowland areas.
